name: Grandmall
description:
Your grandma is quite stubborn. There is a virus on the loose, protect grandma that is dead set on going shopping in these dire times.


  • This is a game made for a Game Jam, it was made in 3-4 days and might not work well with all hardware
  • Please report any bugs you will DEFINITELY find

CONTROLS:

KeyboardController(xbox)FunctionWASDLEFT STICKMove Player
LEFT-MOUSEAThrow Toilet Paper
ESCAPESTARTPause game
